description: Wanda Holloway tries to hire a hitman (through her ex's brother) to kill either or both a cheerleader and her mother. With the intended victims out of the way, Wanda's daughter gets the chance to become a cheerleader. When the med...
keywords: long title,social commentary,police investigation,voice over narration,movie rights
name: The Positively True Adventures of the Alleged Texas Cheerleader-Murdering Mom

original_info.id: The Positively True Adventures of the Alleged Texas Cheerleader-Murdering Mom_1993
original_info.name: The Positively True Adventures of the Alleged Texas Cheerleader-Murdering Mom

review.name: Terrific dark fun.
review.reviewBody: Holly Hunter, once again, steps into television and shows us what could be. This is, believe it or not, based on a true story. I won't go into the plot, but the actors are all great. Besides Hunter, Beau Bridges and Swoozie Kurtz are standouts. The direction is swift and bold and brave, and the music and camera work are all stellar. Worth a look indeed.
